content: Likewise, the full year of 2022 AFFO included $5.4 million of deferred rent repayments in our accrued rental income adjustment without which would have produced AFFO of $3.18 per share for the full year and that represents an 8.9% increase over the similarly adjusted $2.92 per share results in 2021. Thank you very much. Thank you very much. Thank you very much. Thank you very much. Thank you very much. Thank you very much. Thank you very much.
